title: Please HELP ! :)
body:
This just happen to me tomorow - http://prntscr.com/cbpr1s 
Im trying to login but i cant cuz of this - http://prntscr.com/cbpr1s 
I tried to restart my router-internet , computer , i repair lol but it dont work.... 
Then i tried to login on LoL site and this happen - http://prntscr.com/cbpx2n 
Its said that my IP adress is banned from LoL site ?
Then i login on PBE server and it works BUT i tried to  go in shop then this happen - **[Link removed]**
Idk what to do can someone help me pls. AND SORRY FOR MY BAD ENGLISH IM FROM SERBIA........

replies.body:
It appears your IP address has been blacklisted via a Cloudflare ban. In order for us to work with you on a solution, you'll need to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so one of our tech team members can get back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
how come I see you in NA? Should this be in your sever side?
